entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7.
